entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who stood up and looked into Harry's face. He has a loud and strong voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who asked Dumbledore if this was real or happening inside his head.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry looked into each other's faces for a long moment.
Dumbledore spoke to Harry, answering his question about whether this was real or happening inside his head.
